title: Kate Bush's Friend Missing at Sea
summary: Kate Bush, a famous singer, is very sad because her good friend Matthew Upham went missing in the sea on Christmas Day. They were friends for 30 years. Matthew was a kind and fun person who loved swimming and kayaking. Emergency services searched for him in Budleigh Salterton, Devon, but had to stop. Kate shared her feelings on her website, saying Matthew was special and will be missed. His family is also heartbroken and thanked the rescuers for trying to help. This story shows how friends and family feel when someone they love is lost.
